channel.title: Increasing texture res with little loss?
channel.description: So recently I've been increasing the size of some of the textures in Black Mesa but when I re-size them they become slightly blurry is there any way to re-size them in gimp with as little loss in quality as possible.

item.title: Increasing texture res with little loss?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
And, really, there’s only so much information on a texture file, simply increasing the dimensions won’t do much except make it blurrier. If you really want to make the textures themselves higher res, you’ll need to edit the textures to add more detail.

Good luck; I believe that there are thousands of textures in this game.

item.title: Increasing texture res with little loss?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
By increasing the resolution of the textures, you’re messing with the scale at which they were applied in the level editor.

The only way to fix it would be to open the maps in Hammer and readjust the scale, but I’m not sure you can do that without the .vmf files.
